### Description

The basics of programming in R for Kids.

### Installation

```r
swirl::install_course("Data_Science_for_Kids")
```

#### Manual Installation

1. Download [this](http://swirlstats.com/scn/Data_Science_for_Kids-2.swc) file.
2. Run `swirl::install_course()` in the R console.
3. Select the file you just downloaded.
